text: Ian Robert Cross (6 November 1925 â€“ 2 November 2019) was a New Zealand novelist, journalist and administrator. His first novel, The God Boy, was released in 1957. Later novels are The Backward Sex (1959), After ANZAC Day (1961) and The Family Man (1993). ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:New Zealand journalists
title: Ian Cross
